events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I would like to request a refund as the size does not fit me at all and I am quite disappointed.
The customer has reported an issue regarding a refund request due to size not fitting, category assigned accordingly.
Assigning this refund case to agent Sarah M. who specializes in returns and refunds for apparel.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you're requesting a refund for your jacket due to sizing issues. Iâ€™m here to help.
Could you please provide the order number and specify whether the jacket has been worn or washed? This will help us process your refund quickly.
Sure, my order number is #12345ABC. The jacket has never been worn outside and is still in original condition with tags attached.
Thank you for the information. We can start the refund process immediately. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly.
That sounds great! I appreciate your quick response and will send the jacket back as soon as I receive the label.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund and to check if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been completed and there are no further concerns, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us!
